text: Cecil Bustamente Campbell OD (24 May 1938 â€“ 8 September 2016), known professionally as Prince Buster, was a Jamaican singer-songwriter and producer. The records he released in the 1960s influenced Jamaican contemporary music, especially reggae and ska artists. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Jamaican singers
title: Prince Buster
